column2: Skill required:  Trust & Safety - Anti-Money Laundering (AML) Designation:  Business Advisory Associate Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 1 to 3 years  About Accenture Accenture is a global professional services company with leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security.Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries, we offer Strategy and Consulting, Technology and Operations services, and Accenture Song all powered by the worlds largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 699,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries. We embrace the power of change to create value and shared success for our clients, people, shareholders, partners and communities.Visit us at www.accenture.com  What would you do? Enables a superior brand experience , accelerates responsible growth and creates a secure environmentThe Anti Money Laundering team focuses on articulating the business requirements and implement the process and system controls required to prevent moving illegally acquired cash through an organization's financial systems. The role requires a good understanding of anti-money laundry laws and regulations, client on-boarding, sanction screening, remediation, periodical reviews, Customer Due Diligence (CDD), and Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD). What are we looking for? Enables a superior brand experience , accelerates responsible growth and creates a secure environment  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments The decisions that you make would impact your own work You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation
column11: business advisory, business development, client onboarding, marketing, safety, management consulting, project management, company audit, business analysis, auditing, accounting, strategy consulting, product management, agile, corporate strategy

column2: Skill required:Supply Chain - Mechanical Engineering  Designation:Associate  Qualifications:Any Graduation  Years of Experience:1 to 3 years  What would you do? Manage planning, procurement, distribution and aftermarket service supply chain operations, helping clients realize $5 for every $1 spent on our services You will be a part of Supply Chain Management team where in you will be accountable to manage the Supply Chain and provide insights which will help in increasing efficiency by doing away with waste and facilitating greater profits. It also involves management of the flow of goods and services and including all processes that transform raw materials into final products. In this role, you will help in designing, analyzing, and building structures, machines, devices, systems, and mechanical processes for clients to meet their business process and application requirements. You will be working on program manufacturing for CNC machining, resolving problems through the application of acquired expertise guided by precedent. You will be working together with people from the business unit. Contacts are under the guidance and/or geared towards specifying activities, planning of activities, and giving explanations on technical issues. You will be working on monitoring project status, reporting metrics and research. You may also be expected to work on ESPRIT, CAM, NX & SOLIDWORKS.  What are we looking for? Agility for quick learning  Results orientation  Ability to manage multiple stakeholders Roles and Responsibilities:  In this role you are required to solve routine problems, largely through precedent and referral to general guidelines  Your expected interactions are within your own team and direct supervisor  You will be provided detailed to moderate level of instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instruction on new assignments  The decisions that you make would impact your own work  You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a predetermined, focused scope of work  Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts
column11: mechanical engineering, supply chain, business advisory, distribution, research, management consulting, project management, business analysis, business development, marketing, strategy consulting, supply chain management, business consulting, corporate strategy

We help insurers redefine their customer experience while accelerating their innovation agenda to drive sustainable growth by transforming to an intelligent operating model. Intelligent Insurance Operations combines our advisory, technology, and operations expertise, global scale, and robust ecosystem with our insurance transformation capabilities. It is structured to address the scope and complexity of the ever-changing insurance environment and offers a flexible operating model that can meet the unique needs of each market segment.Insurance is a legal agreement between two parties the insurer and the insured, also known as insurance coverage or insurance policy. The insurer provides financial coverage for the losses of the insured that s/he may bear under certain circumstancesProcesses and procedures to meet R&D Global strategy, manage and monitor product development, facilitate transition from R&D into the established product portfolio guarantying R&D efficiency. What are we looking for? SAP FI CO Finance Microsoft Excel Data Analytics and Interpretation Business Requirements Analysis Ability to perform under pressure Written and verbal communication Collaboration and interpersonal skills Strong analytical skills Ability to establish strong client relationship Business Transformation  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of lower-complexity problems Your day to day interaction is with peers within Accenture before updating supervisors In this role you may have limited exposure with clients and/or Accenture management You will be given moderate level instruction on daily work tasks and detailed instructions on new assignments The decisions you make impact your own work and may impact the work of others You will be an individual contributor as a part of a team, with a focused scope of work Please note that this role may require you to work in rotational shifts Qualification Any Graduation

column2: Primary Duties / Responsibilities            Expertise in managing organizational goals is essential for this role.         Seeking a results-oriented deal architect skilled in navigating high-stakes scenarios,  adept at crafting complex deals with finesse and unwavering precision,  meeting daily milestones seamlessly.         Gather and propose ways the Sales Support team can be more effective and productive in quoting.         Collaborate cross-functionally with other departments throughout the company to analyze issues impacting quoting and provide root cause analysis and clear plan on path forward        Ability to handle difficult or unexpected situations in the workplace as well as provide solutions to complex business challenges        Responsible for ensuring the sales support team meets daily SLAs,  maintains consistent weekly performance,  undergoes quarterly reviews,  and achieves yearly ratings aligned with organizational objectives.         Must display adaptability by leading ongoing and new complex projects,  independently managing all phases from operational planning to project delivery.         Proficient in managing team/project performance and contributing to projects outside daily workload when required.         Skilled in gathering stakeholder requirements,  removing project barriers,  and maintaining end-to-end ownership,  ensuring seamless project management from initiation to completion.         Collaboration across multiple departments,  often requiring self-directed execution and minimal supervision to achieve successful outcomes.         Comfortable conducting Root Cause Analysis (RCA) using methodologies like 8D or other relevant approaches when needed.         Proficient in interpreting dashboards and conducting comprehensive 360-degree data analysis to derive insights,  instrumental in resolving project and quoting challenges.         Leads calls,  meetings,  and discussions to ensure timely delivery of quoting-related projects.         Collaborates closely with the team,  manager,  and senior management to streamline processes for improved efficiency and effectiveness.         Oversees interlock calls,  manages stakeholders,  facilitates cross-training,  and delivers training sessions for new processes.         Requires 6-8 years of experience in CPQ,  deal management,  funnel optimization,  and intricate quoting methodologies.         Open to supporting team members within or outside the team when necessary.         Seeks a collaborative team player with certified proficiency in coaching methodologies,  along with a strong command of Scrum or Agile methodologies.

column2: Project Manager will be one point primary contact for the client for all communications. Work with the client to understand the engagement vision and goals. Understand client expectations from the team in terms of deliverables and set expectations of the team and also client as needed. Define communication plan in collaboration with the client. Define deliverables and frequency. Estimate and communicate schedule. Define the methodology and work closely with the team and the client to implement the same. Define and track capacity of the team based on the work load. Review with the client the deliverables and progress daily or as decided in the plan. Understand the client ecosystem,  sales goals,  target profiles and preferred sales approach. Understand the business roles and decision making process of the client. Get feedback and incorporate the same in the reports. Refine the approach as per the feedback. Walk the sales team through the account strategy and approach. Define the metrics and keep reviewing the metrics. Ensure the quality of the lead qualification and relationship rules and reports. Pass on the feedback to the Business analyst and Web researcher. Ensure team motivation and client satisfaction. Work with the Automation architect to automate for scalability and productivity improvement. Skills Needed Excellent Project Management Skills Panning,  Tracking,  Team management,  Estimation,  Expectation setting Excellent business and industry knowledge Pre- sales and Business development experience Good communication skills,  Structured and Process oriented

column2: The role requires you to have an expertise in the Siemens Manufacturing Execution software capabilities for various industries, covering a wide area of solutions from our Digital Manufacturing portfolio.          Presales are significant to our sales process - they are the people that bring our products to life. They spend time understanding what customers need and match their requirements with our products and offerings. Instrumental to a successful sales process, they show the powerful capabilities and opportunities with our industry leading technology.            Your Responsibilities                Act as the digitalization expert for digital manufacturing domain. This includes requirements collection, solution definition and implementation roadmap using Siemens portfolio for the entire transformation process.          Conduct presentations and workshops on standard processes and latest trends in manufacturing digitalization.          Conduct requirements gathering and solution definition workshops by interacting with different functional teams.          Conduct factory assessment for IT-OT interfaces and touchpoints.          Preparation of implementation roadmap for Industry 4.0 adoption.          Preparation of case showcasing improvement in productivity, quality, and efficiency using latest technologies which are part of Industry 4.0.          Deliver product demonstrations and POCs required in PreSales phase.          Develop and update technical proposals.          Assist implementation teams in defining scope of work.            Your background                Experience in manufacturing digitalization (>6 years).          Strong experience in Presales or implementation roles for any commercial off-the-shelf MES/MOM platform.          You feel comfortable in all levels in a company you talk to, project and department leaders as well as to the executives and C-Level.          Proven understanding about practical use of MES systems and Industrial IoT systems.          Expertise in areas such as manufacturing digitalization, automation and process analysis.          Domain knowledge of manufacturing planning, manufacturing execution, quality management, maintenance management, in-plant logistics and manufacturing analytics.          Strong analytical and systemic problem-solving skills with clear passion to develop and inspire changes.          Proven leadership skills in areas of PreSales.          Experience working with cross functional teams!          Self-supporting, able to work without supervision, able to travel away for short periods.          Proficient written and spoken English matched with excellent communication skills.          Degree in Engineering Mechanical / Electronics / Electrical / Information Technology / Computer science or any relevant subject area.

column2: Hiring For Fintech Industry  Requirement :1year experience in (B2B sales) Field Sales in any Sector Locations: Kolkata Salary: Upto 4.5lpa MALE PREFFERED Revenue Generation:  Conducting market research to identify potential customers, market trends, and competitive landscape. Building and maintaining strong relationships with clients and key stakeholders. Analysing sales data and trends to identify areas of improvement and recommend strategies for revenue growth.  Merchant Acquisition:  KAE/PAE is expected to onboard new merchants in the geography allocated to the incumbent. Since payments are agnostic to the category of business. The KAE/PAE must use her/his acumen and understanding of the Indian retail ecosystem to come up with holistic solutions for the key accounts.  Account Management:  Onboarding merchants on the platform is the first stage of a long-term relationship . The strength of these relationships, combined with our technology-based solutions, will eventually determine the success in each market when the revenue numbers will be evaluated. The KAE's/PAE's task is to develop such deep understanding and hold over each account that any competitor finds it an uphill task to even enter the account.  Map Competition:  To be able to take timely action, it is imperative that we monitor market and be informed of competition's activity in key accounts. This will ensure that appropriate response strategies are being formulated and implemented. The KAE/PAE must keep a close watch on competition, share best practices internally and ensure that PhonePe always stays one step ahead in the market.  Warm Regards, Kamaljeet kaur Team O3Hire Contact No: 7508687814 KK.o3hire@gmail.com

column2: The ideal candidate thrives in an innovative, fast-paced environment and is collaborative, accountable, ready, and empathetic     we're looking for individuals who believe they can accomplish more as a team and create lasting growth for themselves and others     We hire based on attitude, competency, and commitment     Solarians are ready to advance our world-class solutions in a fast-paced environment and accept the challenge to lead with purpose     If you're looking to build your career with an exceptional team, You've come to the right place             Your Role:         In this role, you will be able to drive business growth through dedicated GSIs partnerships.     Collaborate with various sales and channel teams in the region and contribute to their business success.     Lead business numbers, growth strategies and alliance relationships across the region.     Drive business results for the region while maintaining and growing alliances in APAC.     Build strategies with partners to make SolarWinds their core Observability technology alliance.         Your Impact:         Manage and work with a select group of new and existing GSI partners to define and execute joint sales and Go to Market (GTM) programs.     Drive GTM execution across activities, including coordination of business generation-related and joint sales enablement activities.     Lead sales pipeline reviews between GSIs and the SolarWinds sales teams.     Act as internal champion for the GSI Partner, driving internal SolarWinds field enablement and account alignment.     Evangelize the SolarWinds solutions with GSI technology teams and find platform-based opportunities to make it a sustainable business.     Drive specific GSI sales revenue through management of regular pipeline, opportunities, and business reviews with the MSP partner and all internal stakeholders.     Prepare and give periodic business reviews to the SolarWinds senior management team.     Understand the technical considerations, certifications, and procurement processes specific to the MSP business area.     Create a predictable business model to drive accurate business forecasts.     Create and manage relationships with key MSP teams across the region.     Work and collaborate with other sales managers, directors and executives across our regional sales organization build joint GTM to unlock incremental revenue potential across APAC markets.         Your Experience:         At least 10 years of years of leading and coaching a quota carrying Partner and Alliances team in APAC market.     Experience leading a consultative sales process.     Experience in coaching - ability to observe, evaluate and use various techniques to improve results.     Excellent time management and organizational skills.     Analytical and strategic mindset and ability to leverage data across all interactions to put strategic plans in place.     Effective communicator and motivator across multiple mediums both externally and internally.     Able to drive results and accountability within the team.     Support the business in cross-functional projects to drive organizational advancement.     Detail oriented and the ability to manage multiple objectives.     Strong analytical skills to identify individual, team and organizational trends using various dashboard and reports.     Proactive and a sense of urgency with identifying leading indicators of upcoming opportunities and challenge

column2: Skill required:  Supply Chain - Supply Chain Management (SCM) Applications Designation:  Business Advisory Associate Qualifications: Any Graduation  Years of Experience: 1 to 3 years  What would you do? Manage planning, procurement, distribution and aftermarket service supply chain operations, helping clients realize $5 for every $1 spent on our servicesYou will be a part of Supply Chain Management team where in you will be accountable to manage the Supply Chain and provide insights which will help in increasing efficiency by doing away with waste and facilitating greater profits. It also involves management of the flow of goods and services and including all processes that transform raw materials into final products.Analyze, design, build, test and deploy innovative digital supply chain-specific solutions that are needed to enable an intelligent SC. What are we looking for? Fulfillment Operations (Order / Warehouse Management) Ability to perform under pressure.  Ability to establish strong client relationship.  Ability to handle disputes. Ability to manage multiple stakeholders.  Ability to meet deadlines.  Roles and Responsibilities: In this role you are required to do analysis and solving of increasingly complex problems.  Your day-to-day interactions are with peers within Accenture. You are likely to have some interaction with clients and/or Accenture management. You will be given minimal instruction on daily work/tasks and a moderate level of instruction on new assignments. Keep track of logistics and update the company's inventory. Analyze operational performance and resolve issues. Decisions that are made by you impact your own work and may impact the work of others.  In this role you would be an individual contributor and/or oversee a small work effort and/or team. Collaborate with vendors and suppliers to ensure all operations (e.g. shipping, delivery) meet quality and on-time delivery standards. Analyze data and processes, find creative solutions, generate reports, and present findings to upper management and other departments. Proficient in MS Office. column2: Location: Gurugram, Work from office (Immediate joiners preferred) We are seeking an experienced Associate Director to join our Merchant Lending division. You will be responsible for driving growth and profitability for our Merchant Lending vertical. Your role will involve shaping the product's strategy, managing key partnerships, and achieving business targets, all while keeping pace with the dynamic fintech landscape. What youll do: Understand the trends and competitive landscape in the Business loans in EMI and EDI industry with previous experience in digital lending Identify potential opportunities for Merchant Lending products and build relationships with top management at Banks/NBFCs/FinTech firms Oversee end-to-end deal closures, including discovery, product structuring, commercial alignment, contract closures and more Ensure compliance with corporate, statutory, and regulatory requirements as well as other relevant internal/external standards for all assigned partners. Stay abreast of changes, competitive shifts, and customer propositions that could impact the business and its customers Experience in business growth, managing funnels, and strategic partnerships with FinTech ecosystem players is highly valued. A strategic thinker who can plan, execute, and adjust according to circumstances, with a clear objective of achieving the organization's strategic vision and business growth What you'll possess: Bachelor's degree in business, Finance, Economics, or a related field; MBA preferred. Existing relationships with ecosystem partners, Banks, and NBFCs are highly desirable. Proven track record of at least 6-10 years in a leadership role within the fintech or financial services industry, with a focus on Secured/Unsecured Lending in the MSME Space. Strong understanding of MSME products, credit risk assessment, and regulatory compliance. Proficient in numerical analysis, advanced Excel, and presenting insights to top management and external stakeholders Exceptional strategic thinking, analytical, and problem-solving skills Excellent interpersonal and communication abilities, with the capability to build and nurture relationships with internal and external stakeholders Proficiency in data analysis tools and financial software

column2: Hiring For Fintech Sector  Requirement : 1 year experience into Field Sales in Any Sector  Locations : Bangalore Salary: Upto 6 Lpa MALE PREFERRED   Responsibilities:   . This is an On field role. Responsibilities: Merchant Acquisition: Growth Executive (GE) is expected to onboard new merchants in the geography allocated to the incumbent. Since payments are agnostic to the category of business, the spectrum of merchants that can be onboarded is vast. The GE must use her/his acumen and understanding of the Indian retail ecosystem to come up with holistic solutions for the key accounts. Account Management: Onboarding merchants on the platform is the first stage of a long-term relationship between and the account. The strength of these relationships, combined with our technology based solutions, will eventually determine the success in each market when the revenue numbers will be evaluated. GE's task is to develop such a deep understanding and hold over each account that any competitor finds it an uphill task to even enter the account. Map Competition: To be able to take timely action, it is imperative that we monitor the market and be informed of competitions activity in key accounts. This will ensure that appropriate response strategies are being formulated and implemented. The GE must keep a close watch on competition, share best practices internally and ensure that always stays one step ahead in the market. Revenue Generation: GE is responsible for generating revenue from existing/new accounts through ad sales proposition ( Current products Scratch card /Banners/smart speakers). Prior revenue experience will be preferred. Requirements: Proven working experience of 1-3 years in sales/business development Excellence communication and influencing skills Strong ethics and discretion while dealing with customers Drive for result, able to demonstrate/quantify success relative to established targets and metrics Strong bias for action, problem solving and ownership Ability to develop strong relationships with stakeholders and be a team player Warm Regards, kamaljeet kaur Team O3Hire +91-7508687814 kk.o3hire@gmail.com

column2: This role, GFA (Global Field Activation) - Dynamic Targeting Associate Consultant / Sr. Associate Consultant, will report to the GFA SFO Team Leader and work within a team set up to provide critical capabilities for Lilly US Business Unit. These capabilities may include Field Call planning and Refinement, Dynamic targeting, Dynamic targeting diagnostics, insight generation, reporting and feedback loops.       Key accountabilities will include the following:           Collate information regarding the Dynamic targeting diagnostic framework and purposes of analysis; Conduct analysis draw insights on acceptance and execution of dynamic targeting suggestions.       Use new technology such as ML Gen AI to analyze feedback surveys, other datasets to draw actionable insights.     Present these insights results to key stakeholders for driving key business decisions.     Establishing what are some of the KPIs to measure adoption usage of any new digital offering or a new engagement model.     Brainstorm on the right performance tracking measures to check whether a new capability/offering is achieving the intended goals.       Leverage statistical analyses such as regression, Anova, A/B testing etc. to track KPIs, draw insights suggest course correction, if required.       Use datasets such as field execution, tool activity, sales, surveys etc. to track tweak the deployed field engagement platforms.       Provide inputs to optimize the field force effectiveness through processes such as Sales Force Sizing, Alignment Design, Personnel Placement, Targeting, Incentives etc.          Create models such as the customer behaviour profile to support the sales teams to enhance and track performance of the field force against plans.         Setup recurring Tableau, Power BI reports to measure key KPIs of field force execution.         Use data and reports to develop, optimize, and implement strategies aimed at improving sales teams performance.       Automate excel-based operations to SQL/Python for improving processing turn-around time, and set-up quality assurance procedures.     Validate data quality and accuracy of the results of existing processes.       Basic Qualifications:       Bachelor s Degree     Ensure compliance with company policies and any applicable state and federal marketing and promotion laws and regulations.          Additional Skills/Preferences:         BTech/ MBA with 4-6 years (Associate Consultant), 6-8 years (Sr. Associate Consultant) of experience in sales planning and management          Knowledge of data analytics and visualization tools (BI, Tableau), Javelin suite of products, CRM systems, Veeva, SQL, AWS, and MS Office       Excellent communication (written verbal) and prioritization skills with attention to detail.     Strong learning agility     Strong analytical mindset     High level of motivation and a strong desire to find creative solutions to challenging situations.     Keen focus on detail, accuracy, and ability to solve problems, supported by strong analytical reasoning.     Experience in designing feedback surveys and text analytics.     Experience in business analysis.     Experience working on SFE for US                       Additional Information:   Lilly is an EEO/Affirmative Action Employer, and does not discriminate on the basis of race, gender, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status     ?

column1: Deputy Sales Manager/ Assistant Manager- Corporate Sales
column2: Job Description:  Establish and develop new accounts Maintain rapport with clients. Resolve client complaints ensuring client satisfaction. Work on Lead Management and generate Database for respective region and add the same to master database. Leads and data to be monitored on regular basis. Meet sales target set in term of product and revenue. Meet or exceed assigned monthly booking target in the assigned sales territory/ market Responsible for the granting of credit limit and collection of outstanding payment Able to travel domestic for sales calls and participate in corporate events both local and Domestic Able to strategise marketing plans to achieve sales and profit Work closely with Operations and back office staff to provide excellent service to clients Administrative duties such as preparing of marketing call reports,  keep track of group bookings etc Handle client's feedback,  complaints on all booking issues. Actively participate in Road Shows Any other duties reasonably assigned by the Supervisor Return Business telephone calls. Promptly respond to all inquiries,  prospects,  and tentative or definite business. Be familiar with all services/ features to respond to client inquiries accurately. Assist in achieving or exceeding budgeted goals in sales and profit for the Company. Plan and execute cost- effective and productive sales trips into assigned territory to improve and increase our penetration of that market. Report on trends in the industry and competition Update and maintain recording system including:  - MIS reports - Productivity report,  Corporate profile,  weekly call plannerDesired Profile:  Degree in Hotel Management /  BCOM / MBA Marketing is preferable. Should be young,  presentable and energetic with good communication skills. Should be able to handle and manage the team effectively. Should possess a Go- Getting attitude and ability to achieve all targets. Must possess good knowledge of Hotel /  Travel industry. Must possess work experience in a Travel company /  star hotel in the similar capacity.
